pageContext.claim: “Since 2017, ICE successfully arrested half a million illegal aliens with criminal records, including over 145,000 assaults, over 40,000 sex offenses, and 5,000 killings. I want to thank ICE.”
pageContext.analysis: Many of the “criminal aliens” Trump is describing are immigrants who were convicted of immigration or nonviolent offenses. He switched from the total for ICE arrests ("half a million") to a different number that includes all the different charges. It’s a misleading, apples-and-oranges comparison because one individual may face multiple charges — and not all arrests result in convictions.
